name: What Do You Call A Group Of Cats?
name_original: What Do You Call A Group Of Cats?
description:
Created for the 2021 Epic MegaJam.

The cats have to escape Space and you are their only hope. Find and guide them to the exit to escape from Space. Guide, stack and send them jumping to complete the game!

Assets Used:

LowPoly Cats by Radik Bilalov 

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/lowpoly-cats

Thanks to Alex Peterson and Spacescape for the space-themed skybox. http://alexcpeterson.com/spacescape/

Many Thanks to WeLoveIndies for the awesome music and SFX. https://www.weloveindies.com/
